item.title: xmltools 1.3.7
item.descr: bugfix in namespace handling

item.title: Python-logic
item.descr: Set up of the Python-Logic special interest group

item.title: PyReverse 0.2.3
item.descr: New features and bug fixes

item.title: xmltools 1.3.6
item.descr: Uses the new APIs in pyxml-0.7 and 4Suite-0.12.0

item.title: hmm-0.2
item.descr: New learning algorithms available

item.title: Version 1.2a1 is out
item.descr: Overall refactoring of the engine. Backward incompatible changes in the syntax of recipes and in modules, in order to ease product development.

item.title: XMLdiff v0.5.3 (bug fixes)
item.descr: Version 0.5.3 fixes packaging bugs.

item.title: hmm-0.1
item.descr: hmm is a module for Hidden Markov Model manipulation.

item.title: PyReverse 0.1 (new product)
item.descr: Beta release for this set of tools for reverse engineering python code

item.title: PyPaSax 0.3 (bug fixes)
item.descr: A few changes in the DTD, improved PyXML compatibility

item.title: XMLdiff v0.5.2 (bug fixes)
item.descr: Version 0.5.2 fixes several bugs.

item.title: Version 1.1 is out
item.descr: bugfixes over beta 3.

item.title: Version 1.1b3 is out
item.descr: Great speed improvement for Horn. All-in-one windows installer.

item.title: xmltools-1.3.5
item.descr: Version 1.3.5 code cleanup.

item.title: xmltools-1.3.4
item.descr: Version 1.3.4 fixes a sever encoding bug that could cause crashes on windows machines.

item.title: Version 1.1b1 is out
item.descr: Version 1.1b1 drops support for Python 1.5.2 in favor of Python 2.1, and features a new version of Horn, with localization support

item.title: XMLdiff v0.5 (algorithm change, bug fixes)
item.descr: Version 0.5. The new algorithm makes it now usable either on big documents and really faster in any cases. Fixes Unicode problem.

item.title: XMLtools v1.3.1 (bugfixes)
item.descr: Version 1.3.1. This release fixes some minor glitches that had slipped in 1.3.

item.title: XMLdiff v0.2 (performance improvement)
item.descr: Version 0.2. Huge performance improvement, and output cleanup.

item.title: XMLdiff v0.1.1 (beta release)
item.descr: Version 0.1.1. Fully functional. Beta release.

item.title: XPathVis v1.0beta (beta release)
item.descr: Version 1.0beta. Works nicely.

item.title: XMLtools v1.3 (new features)
item.descr: Version 1.3. This release is compatible with Python 2.x and Unicode. It is not guaranteed to work with Python 1.5.2.

item.title: Narval on developerWorks
item.descr: An Introduction to Narval was published on developerWorks.

item.title: Version 1.0.1 is out
item.descr: Version 1.0.1 is a bugfix release.

item.title: Narval reviewed on AI.About.com
item.descr: AI.About.com published a review of Narval.

item.title: Narval at BotShow 2001
item.descr: Narval was presented at the first BotShow event. The slides will soon be available online.

item.title: Version 1.0 is out
item.descr: Version 1.0. Celebration time, come on!

item.title: Network-boot-HOWTO v0.2.1
item.descr: Version 0.2.1 is out.

item.title: GuessLang v0.1.0 (beta release)
item.descr: Version 0.1.0 is out.

item.title: Network-boot-HOWTO v0.1.1
item.descr: Version 0.1.1 is out.

item.title: PyPaSax v0.1
item.descr: Version 0.1 is out.

item.title: RC2 is out
item.descr: Release Candidate 2 is out. French documentation will be updated within a few days. We also released several applications (or maybe extension sets?) that are in alpha/beta stage. Give them a try!

item.title: VCalSax v0.1 (beta)
item.descr: Version 0.1 is out. Still beta, but fully functional.

item.title: Talk at LinuxExpo in English
item.descr: A translation of the talk we gave at Linux Expo 2001 is available on-line.

item.title: RC1 is out
item.descr: Release Candidate 1 is out. Documentation will be updated within a few days. Please help us test this one so that we can release 1.0 quicker.

item.title: XMLtools v1.2 (stable release)
item.descr: Version 1.2 is released. Bugfixes, mainly..

item.title: Application section on web site
item.descr: We just added a new applications section on Logilab.org web site.

item.title: WMgMon v0.4.0
item.descr: version 0.4.0 is out. Bugfixes and new monitor functions.

item.title: XmlTools v1.1
item.descr: version 1.1 is out. New features in XmlTree.

item.title: Beta5 is out
item.descr: Beta 5 is out. Lots of bugfixes in Narval and Horn, client server communication between the kernel and the graphical interface using SOAP. Windows specific bugfixes.

item.title: XmlTools v1.0
item.descr: Initial release.

item.title: PyGantt v0.6.0
item.descr: Version 0.6.0 released. New features added.

item.title: Beta4 is out
item.descr: Beta 4 is out. Improved Windows compatibility. New features and bugfixes in both Narval and Horn.

item.title: Article on Narval in Linux Gazette
item.descr: We published an article in the #59 issue of the Linux Gazette. It describes Narval and its use to set up Gazo, the assistant-coordinator for the translation of the Linux Gazette.

item.title: Beta3 is out
item.descr: Beta 3 is out. No more memory leaks (almost). Time conditions work correctly. A step can be an XSL transform. Changes in the Narval DTD.

item.title: Logilab invited at Linux Expo
item.descr: We got invited to give a talk at Linux Expo in Paris, France. The talk will be geared toward business uses of Narval. The title will be Using XML and Intelligent Personal Assistants to enhance groupware and workflow enterprise applications. Come and meet with us!

item.title: Beta2 is out
item.descr: Beta 2 is out. Installation is much easier. Tutorial. GUI improvements. Bugfixes.

item.title: Beta1 is out
item.descr: Beta 1 is out. Many bug fixes.

item.title: Beta0 is out
item.descr: Beta 0 is out. Logilab.org is one-line.
